channel.title: fast on Yummy Collection
channel.description: Recent content in fast on Yummy Collection

item.title: Spätzle
item.description: Ingredients Serves 4 people 400g flour 4 medium sized eggs 1 ts salt 220ml cold water Instructions Heat up a big pot of salted water Mix all ingredients well until bubbles in the dough appear Put the spätzle in the boiling water Once they appear on the surface they’re cooked

item.title: Doriyaki
item.description: Ingredients: 2 eggs 20g sugar 2 Tbsp honey 1/2 ts Vanilla extract 90g flour 1 ts baking powder 10 ml water Instructions: Add eggs, sugar, honey and vanilla in a bowl and stir until the sugar is dissolved Add flour, baking powder, water and whisk it Leave for 10m Set stove to low heat and add dough, when bubbles appear, flip

item.title: Korean Cucumber Salad
item.description: Ingredients 2 Servings 1 big cucumber 1 Tbsp salt 2 cloves garlic 1 spring onion 1 Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp rice vinegar 1 tabespoon sugar 1 tabespoon sesame seeds 1 ts chili flakes 1 ts sesame oil Instructions Wash cucumber, remove skin if desired. Cut it to small pieces and put it in a bowl with 1 Tbsp of salt and leave it for 20m Roast sesame seeds in a frying pan without any oil Chop spring onion and cut garlic and add with all the other ingredients in a bowl Wash the cucumber thouroughly, there should be no salt left Add the cucumber to the bowl, sprinkle with the roasted sesame seeds

item.title: Ice Cream
item.description: One of Ben & Jerry’s basic ice cream receipes. Ingredients 2 large eggs 125g cup sugar 400ml heavy/whipping cream 200ml milk Instructions Whisk the eggs until light and fluffy for about 1-2m Whisk in the sugar, a little at a time, continue whisking until it’s completely blended. Keep going for about 1 minute more Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend

item.title: Flammkuchen / tarte flambée
item.description: Servings Produces 2 Flammkuchen Ingredients: 200g flour 1 ts salt 2 Tbsp oil 110ml water Instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl Knead them for 3 minutes Variations: Gratinée: with Gruyère cheese Forestière: with mushrooms Sweet: dessert version with apples and cinnamon, flambéed with Calvados
